channel.title: Tricky Bastard DC [525]
channel.description:
Hello, i got a server, wich is 525, and it have an annoying error that i can´t fix. The problem is, when i cast a spell, then drink a potion, I Disconnect. Stupid right? Well i think that problem is the potions, because i replaced with a normal itemselect.java (that file contains the potions i think, i also think that potions are on player.java too.) and the glitch was gone.
So please moparscape community, Help me. Heres the files Below.
Thank you.
